sentence.Network_en: It can be difficult to find a good babysitter.
sentence.Network_cn: 要找一个好的临时保姆可能很难。

sentence.Network_en: Any time you want a babysitter, dear, you only have to ask.
sentence.Network_cn: 亲爱的，你什么时候需要人帮忙照看孩子，只要开口说一声就行。

sentence.Network_en: She couldn't always afford a babysitter.
sentence.Network_cn: 她并不是总能请得起临时保姆。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 保姆(babysitter)就像一般保姆,但不会煮东西.当家里没女佣时她就会做女佣的工作,不过孩子是优先的厨师(cook)是针对大学资料片而设.
必备单词BEST2 - 豆丁网 ... a variety of 各种各样的 babysitter 临时保姆 go camping 去野营.
各种职业名称用英语写_百度知道 ... au pair-- 换工住宿的女孩 babysitter-- 临时照顾幼儿者 caretaker-- 看管者.

My wife insists that we hire a babysitter ., 我妻子坚持要雇一个保姆.

entry.def: If you babysit for someone or babysit their children, you look after their children while they are out.

example.ex: I promised to babysit for Mrs Plunkett...
example.tran: 我答应给普伦基特夫人临时照看孩子。

example.ex: My friend asked me to babysit for her six-month-old son...
example.tran: 我朋友请我临时看顾她6个月大的儿子。

means.word_mean: 1. a person engaged to care for children when the parents are not home

auth_sentence.content: The babysitter declined to join the boys for dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content: The babysitter declined to join the boys for dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The babysitter declined to join the boys for dinner.

auth_sentence.content: When the babysitter arrived, I sent her home.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the babysitter arrived, I sent her home.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the babysitter arrived, I sent her home.

auth_sentence.content: Why can't you be my babysitter anymore?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why can't you be my babysitter anymore?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why can't you be my babysitter anymore?

Sentence.sentence: She does not think it's necessary to stay home every day with the children and she knows a very reliable babysitter who's willing to come to her house.
Tom does not think a babysitter can replace a mother and thinks it's a bad idea for the children to spend so much time with someone who's not part of the family
What does Tom think about hiring a babysitter?
